DataElement.preferredName: Patient History Immune System and Related Disorders Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Free-text field to capture another name of immunosuppressive disease in the medical history of a patient that is not already specified or mentioned.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: the medical history of a patient.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: An account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredName: Chronic or Associated Diseases and Exposures
ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: chronic diseases, as well as diseases and exposures associated with cancer.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Immune System and Related Disorders Text
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A group of non-neoplastic and neoplastic disorders  resulting from the deregulation and/or deficiency of immune system functions.  It includes autoimmune disorders (e.g., lupus erythematosus, dermatomyositis, rheumatoid arthritis), congenital and acquired immunodeficiency syndromes including the acquired immune deficiency syndrome (AIDS), and neoplasms (e.g., lymphomas and malignancies secondary to transplantation.)_Text; the words of something written.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Immune System and Related Disorders Text
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A group of non-neoplastic and neoplastic disorders  resulting from the deregulation and/or deficiency of immune system functions.  It includes autoimmune disorders (e.g., lupus erythematosus, dermatomyositis, rheumatoid arthritis), congenital and acquired immunodeficiency syndromes including the acquired immune deficiency syndrome (AIDS), and neoplasms (e.g., lymphomas and malignancies secondary to transplantation.):Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: A group of non-neoplastic and neoplastic disorders resulting from the deregulation and/or deficiency of immune system functions. It includes autoimmune disorders (e.g., lupus erythematosus, dermatomyositis, rheumatoid arthritis), congenital and acquired immunodeficiency syndromes including the acquired immune deficiency syndrome (AIDS), and neoplasms (e.g., lymphomas and malignancies secondary to transplantation).

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Curated for The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) by request of T. Lichtenberg 10/2010 sw
